LuaScript:
board = "9f2659"
bag = "2ecb94"
pieceBag = "7aae0a"
players = {"Blue", "Green", "Yellow", "Red"}
walls = {"Blue", "Green", "Yellow", "Red"}

startingZones = {"Blue", "Green", "Yellow", "Red"}
startingZones["Blue"] = "88711a"
startingZones["Green"] = "63c0ec"
startingZones["Yellow"] = "6769bb"
startingZones["Red"] = "e1e870"

die = "e18fc7"
roll = nil

sPos = {}

lastHeld = nil

players["Red"] = {"d11444", "06e2ed", "9bd478", "dd392c"}
players["Green"] = {"59d3f0", "51d02b", "05a7b5", "8e7868"}
players["Blue"] = {"58b3d5", "21ba3b", "0c4967", "76d966"}
players["Yellow"] = {"4458db", "b8df3f", "a9658e", "a0f471"}

currentPlayer = nil
previousPlayer = nil

wallPickupPosition = nil

winZone = "f151fe"
objectInWinZone = false

function onLoad(save_state)
    print "test"
    sPos = {}
    -- set current player to first from list of seated, since host always goes first
    currentPlayer = getSeatedPlayers()[1]
end

function onObjectPickedUp(player_color, picked_up_object)
    lastHeld = picked_up_object

    if isPlayersPiece(player_color, picked_up_object) and currentPlayer == player_color then
        print "woohoo"
    elseif isPlayersWall(player_color, picked_up_object) and currentPlayer == player_color then
        wallPickupPosition = picked_up_object.getPosition()
    else
        picked_up_object.reload()
    end
end

function onObjectDropped(player_color, dropped_object)
    if isPlayersWall(player_color, dropped_object) and getWallMoveDistance(dropped_object, wallPickupPosition) then
        pieces = getObjectFromGUID(pieceBag).getObjects()
        local count = 0

        for i = 1, tableLength(pieces), 1 do
            if isPlayersPieceFromGUID(player_color, pieces[i].guid) then
                params = {}

                if count == 0 then
                    params.position = wallPickupPosition
                elseif count == 1 then
                    params.position = dropped_object.getPosition()
                else
                    break
                end

                params.guid = pieces[i].guid
                o = getObjectFromGUID(pieceBag).takeObject(params)
                -- o.setTable("startingPos", sPos[o.getGUID()])
                count = count + 1
            end
        end

        getObjectFromGUID(bag).putObject(dropped_object)
    elseif isPlayersPiece(player_color, dropped_object) and objectInWinZone then
         dropped_object.destruct()
         print "Test"
     end
end

function onPlayerTurnStart(player_color_start, player_color_previous)
    -- set current player to this player
    currentPlayer = player_color_start

    -- set previous player to previous player ;)
    previousPlayer = player_color_previous

    local objectsInStartingZone = getObjectFromGUID(startingZones[currentPlayer]).getObjects()

    for i = 1, tableLength(objectsInStartingZone), 1 do
        if isPlayersPiece(currentPlayer, objectsInStartingZone[i]) then objectsInStartingZone[i].lock() end
    end

    math.randomseed(os.clock())
    local dieObject = getObjectFromGUID(die)
    local dieVal = nil

    local var1 = math.random(1, 6)
    local var2 = math.random(1, 6)
    local var3 = math.random(1, 6)

    if var1 == 6 or var2 == 6 or var3 == 6 then dieVal = 6 else dieVal = var1 end

    dieObject.setValue(dieVal)

    if dieVal == 6 then
        for i = 1, tableLength(objectsInStartingZone), 1 do
            if isPlayersPiece(currentPlayer, objectsInStartingZone[i]) then objectsInStartingZone[i].unlock() end
        end
    end
end

function onObjectEnterScriptingZone(zone, enter_object)
    print(zone.getGUID())
    if zone.getGUID() == winZone then
        print(walls[currentPlayer][1])
        print(walls[currentPlayer][2])
        objectInWinZone = true
    end
end

function onObjectLeaveScriptingZone(zone, leave_object)
    if zone.getGUID() == winZone then
        objectInWinZone = false
    end
end

function isPlayersPiece(player_color, picked_up_object)
    for i = 1, 4, 1 do
        if players[player_color][i] == picked_up_object.getGUID() then
            return true
        end
    end
    return false
end

function isPlayersPieceFromGUID(player_color, object_GUID)
    for i = 1, 4, 1 do
        if players[player_color][i] == object_GUID then
            return true
        end
    end
    return false
end

function isPlayersWall(player_color, picked_up_object)

    if walls[player_color] != nil then
        print(tableLength(walls[player_color]))

        for i = 1, tableLength(walls[player_color]), 1 do
            if walls[player_color][i] == picked_up_object.getGUID() then
                return true
            end
        end
    end
    return false
end

function getWallMoveDistance(wall_object, old_wall_position)
    print(old_wall_position['x'])
    print(wall_object.getPosition()['x'])
    if math.abs(old_wall_position['x'] - wall_object.getPosition()['x']) > 0.6 then return true
    elseif math.abs(old_wall_position['z'] - wall_object.getPosition()['z']) > 0.6 then return true
    else return false end
end

function tableLength(T)
  local count = 0
  for _ in pairs(T) do count = count + 1 end
  return count
end

ObjectStates.Name: PlayerPawn
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
bag = Global.getVar("bag")
pieceBag = Global.getVar("pieceBag")
startingPos = nil

function onLoad(save_state)
    if startingPos == nil then
        local sPos = Global.getTable("sPos")
        if sPos[self.getGUID()] != nil then startingPos = sPos[self.getGUID()]
        else startingPos = self.getPosition() end
    end
end

function onCollisionEnter(collision_info)

    local lastHeld = Global.getVar("lastHeld")

    if Global.getVar("board") != collision_info.collision_object.getGUID() then
        if not compareColors(self, collision_info.collision_object) then
            if collision_info.collision_object.getGUID() == lastHeld.getGUID() then
                self.setPosition(startingPos, false, true)
            end
        elseif self.getGUID() == lastHeld.getGUID() and self.getName() != "wall" and collision_info.collision_object.getName() != "wall" then

            local sPos = Global.getTable("sPos")
            sPos[self.getGUID()] = startingPos
            sPos[collision_info.collision_object.getGUID()] = collision_info.collision_object.getTable("startingPos")
            Global.setTable("sPos", sPos)

            getObjectFromGUID(pieceBag).putObject(self)
            getObjectFromGUID(pieceBag).putObject(collision_info.collision_object)

            params = {}
            params.position = collision_info.collision_object.getPosition()
            wall = getObjectFromGUID(bag).takeObject(params)
            wall.setColorTint(collision_info.collision_object.getColorTint())

            walls = Global.getTable("walls")
            currentPlayer = Global.getVar("currentPlayer")

            if walls[currentPlayer] == nil then walls[currentPlayer] = {} end

            table.insert(walls[currentPlayer], wall.getGUID())

            Global.setTable("walls", walls)
        end
    end
end

function setStartingPosition(s)
    startingPos = s
end

function compareColors(o1, o2)
    r1 = o1.getColorTint()['r'];
    g1 = o1.getColorTint()['g'];
    b1 = o1.getColorTint()['b'];

    r2 = o2.getColorTint()['r'];
    g2 = o2.getColorTint()['g'];
    b2 = o2.getColorTint()['b'];

    if r1 == r2 and g1 == g2 and b1 == b2 then return true else return false end
end

            walls = Global.getTable("walls")
            currentPlayer = Global.getVar("currentPlayer")

            if walls[currentPlayer] == nil then walls[currentPlayer] = {} end

            table.insert(walls[currentPlayer], wall.getGUID())

            Global.setTable("walls", walls)
        end
    end
end

function setStartingPosition(s)
    startingPos = s
end

function compareColors(o1, o2)
    r1 = o1.getColorTint()['r'];
    g1 = o1.getColorTint()['g'];
    b1 = o1.getColorTint()['b'];

    r2 = o2.getColorTint()['r'];
    g2 = o2.getColorTint()['g'];
    b2 = o2.getColorTint()['b'];

    if r1 == r2 and g1 == g2 and b1 == b2 then return true else return false end
end

ObjectStates.Name: PlayerPawn
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
bag = Global.getVar("bag")
pieceBag = Global.getVar("pieceBag")
startingPos = nil

function onLoad(save_state)
    if startingPos == nil then
        local sPos = Global.getTable("sPos")
        if sPos[self.getGUID()] != nil then startingPos = sPos[self.getGUID()]
        else startingPos = self.getPosition() end
    end
end

function onCollisionEnter(collision_info)

    local lastHeld = Global.getVar("lastHeld")

    if Global.getVar("board") != collision_info.collision_object.getGUID() then
        if not compareColors(self, collision_info.collision_object) then
            if collision_info.collision_object.getGUID() == lastHeld.getGUID() then
                self.setPosition(startingPos, false, true)
            end
        elseif self.getGUID() == lastHeld.getGUID() and self.getName() != "wall" and collision_info.collision_object.getName() != "wall" then

            local sPos = Global.getTable("sPos")
            sPos[self.getGUID()] = startingPos
            sPos[collision_info.collision_object.getGUID()] = collision_info.collision_object.getTable("startingPos")
            Global.setTable("sPos", sPos)

            getObjectFromGUID(pieceBag).putObject(self)
            getObjectFromGUID(pieceBag).putObject(collision_info.collision_object)

            params = {}
            params.position = collision_info.collision_object.getPosition()
            wall = getObjectFromGUID(bag).takeObject(params)
            wall.setColorTint(collision_info.collision_object.getColorTint())

            walls = Global.getTable("walls")
            currentPlayer = Global.getVar("currentPlayer")

            if walls[currentPlayer] == nil then walls[currentPlayer] = {} end

            table.insert(walls[currentPlayer], wall.getGUID())

            Global.setTable("walls", walls)
        end
    end
end

function setStartingPosition(s)
    startingPos = s
end

function compareColors(o1, o2)
    r1 = o1.getColorTint()['r'];
    g1 = o1.getColorTint()['g'];
    b1 = o1.getColorTint()['b'];

    r2 = o2.getColorTint()['r'];
    g2 = o2.getColorTint()['g'];
    b2 = o2.getColorTint()['b'];

    if r1 == r2 and g1 == g2 and b1 == b2 then return true else return false end
end
